a_comment: Don't change debug only values during normal generation
String field accept any text value
Boolean fields accept true or false
Point fields accept a x,y value
Size fields accept a width,height value
MinMaxSize fields accept a minWidth,minHeight,maxWidth,maxHeight value
MinMaxColor fields accept a minR,minG,minB,minA,maxR,maxG,maxB,maxA value
Color fields accept a red,green,blue,alpha value
Integer fields accept a number without a floating point
Float fields accept a number with a floating point
Random values can be generated using a minValue_maxValue syntax, e.g. roomsCount: "5_10,6_12"
mapName_comment: STRING: The name of the map
gameDirectoryPath_comment: STRING: Path to the directory of the game
mapGfxPath_comment: STRING: (DEBUG ONLY) Path to the graphics directory of the map
cropMap_comment: BOOLEAN: (DEBUG ONLY) Crop the unnecessary tiles of the map during generation
roomsCount_comment: POINT: Total count of rooms generated horizontally and vertically
roomMinMaxSize_comment: MINMAXSIZE: Min and max base randomized horizontal/vertical size in tiles of the generated rooms of the map's carcass
wallMinMaxSize_comment: MINMAXSIZE: Min and max randomized width of the horizontal/vertical walls of the rooms in tiles
wallMaxOffset_comment: POINT: How much horizontal/vertical walls can be offset towards the center of the room from their base position
doorMinMaxWidth_comment: MINMAXSIZE: Min and max randomized width of the horizontal/vertical doors of the rooms
styleCount_comment: INTEGER: Total count of possible room styles. Not guaranteed that all styles will be used.
Please note that each consecutive style has a +1 height for shadow generation.
styleSizeMinMaxSize_comment: MINMAXSIZE: Min and max size of the randomized style of the room compared to the base size of the room
floorMinMaxTintBase_comment: MINMAXCOLOR: Base randomized min max floor texture tint
wallMinMaxTintBase_comment: MINMAXCOLOR: Base randomized min max wall texture tint
floorTintPerHeight_comment: COLOR: Floor texture tint change per style height
wallTintPerHeight_comment: COLOR: Wall texture tint change per style height
wallHeight_comment: INTEGER: (DEBUG) Wall height (for shadow generation purposes)
patternResourceCount_comment: INTEGER: How many pattern resources are available
patternMinMaxTintFloor_comment: MINMAXCOLOR: Min max randomized floor pattern tint
patternMinMaxTintWall_comment: MINMAXCOLOR: Min max randomized wall pattern tint
roomLightMinMaxTint_comment: COLOR: Min max randomized room light effect tint values
outputTextFilePath_comment: STRING: Path to the text file into which basic output is printed
gameVersion_comment: STRING: Game version, change if necessary
crateBlockingChance_comment: INTEGER: Chance that a spawned crate will be blocking
cratesMinMaxSpaceLeftPerRoom_comment: MINMAXSIZE: Each crate takes up 1x1 space until this much space is left in a room
crateNonBlockingMinMaxTint_comment: MINMAXCOLOR: Randomized non blocking crate tint
cratesBlockingPerStyle_comment: INTEGER: Amount of blocking crate styles per room style
cratesNonBlockingPerStyle_comment: INTEGER: Amount of non blocking crate styles per room style
